Override.entitydescription.ampicillin: An aminopenicillin class antibiotic used to treat various bacterial infections.
Override.entitydescription.augmentin: An aminopenicillin class antibiotic combined with a beta-lactamase inhibitor.
Override.entitydescription.vancomycin: A glycopeptide antibiotic used to treat various gram-positive bacterial infections.
Override.entitydescription.gentamicin: An aminoglycoside antibiotic used to treat various gram-negative bacterial infections.
Override.entitydescription.cotrim: A combination antibiotic used to treat a wide variety of bacterial infections.
Override.entitydescription.imipenem: A combination carbapenem antibiotic used against a wide variety of bacterial infections.
Override.afflictiondescription.afstrepvac: The patient's immune system is primed and ready to fight against streptococcal infections.
Override.entitydescription.strepvac: A vaccine that prepares the immune system to fight against streptococcus strains.
Override.afflictiondescription.afstaphvac: The patient's immune system is primed and ready to fight against staphylococcal infections.
Override.entitydescription.staphvac: A vaccine that prepares the immune system to fight against staphylococcal strains.
Override.afflictiondescription.afpseudovac: The patient's immune system is primed and ready to fight against pseudomonas infections.
Override.entitydescription.pseudovac: A vaccine that prepares the immune system to fight against pseudomonas strains.
Override.afflictiondescription.afprovovac: The patient's immune system is primed and ready to fight against provobacter infections.
Override.entitydescription.provovac: A vaccine that prepares the immune system to fight against provobacter strains.
Override.entitydescription.weaponstrep: A syringe filled with a strain of streptococcus with the purpose of infecting a target.
Override.entitydescription.weaponstaph: A syringe filled with a strain of staphylococcus with the purpose of infecting a target.
Override.entitydescription.weaponmrsa: A syringe filled with a strain of MRSA with the purpose of infecting a target.
Override.entitydescription.weaponpseudo: A syringe filled with a strain of pseudomonas with the purpose of infecting a target.
Override.entitydescription.weaponprovo: A syringe filled with a strain of provobacter with the purpose of infecting a target.
Override.afflictiondescription.pusyellow: A yellowish-white pus oozes from the wound.
Override.afflictiondescription.pusgreen: A greenish, foul-smelling pus oozes from the wound.
Override.afflictiondescription.abscess: A large pocket of pus accumulates under the skin.
Override.afflictiondescription.necfasc: The skin shows deep discoloration and the soft tissue is dying.
Override.afflictiondescription.cellulitis: The area of skin is red and painful.
Override.entitydescription.cultureanalyzer: Collects bacterial samples and stores it in a culture tube.
Override.entitydescription.culturetube: A tube of rich growth medium that bacterial colonies will grow in.
Override.entitydescription.incubatorcrate: A crate capable of growing cultures due to its ability to regulate optimal storage conditions.
Override.entitydescription.streptubeunk: A culture tube with an unknown sample.
Override.entitydescription.streptube: A culture tube with a streptococcus strain.
Override.entitydescription.staphtubeunk: A culture tube with an unknown sample.
Override.entitydescription.staphtube: A culture tube with a staphyloccocus strain.
Override.entitydescription.mrsatubeunk: A culture tube with an unknown sample.
Override.entitydescription.mrsatube: A culture tube with a MRSA sample.
Override.entitydescription.pseudotubeunk: A culture tube with an unknown sample.
Override.entitydescription.pseudotube: A culture tube with a pseudomonas sample.
Override.entitydescription.provotubeunk: A culture tube with an unknown sample.
Override.entitydescription.provotube: A culture tube with a provobacter sample.
Override.entitydescription.emptytubeunk: A culture tube with an unknown sample.
Override.entitydescription.cultureanalyzingtermin: A machine that examines the biochemical signature of bacterial colonies to identify pathogens.
Override.cultureanalyzer.info: Insert a full-grown culture sample to analyze the type.
Override.entitydescription.incubatorterminal: A machine capable of growing cultures by maintaining the optimal conditions for bacterial growth.
Override.entitydescription.dextromethorphan: An antitussive solution used to relieve a cough.
Override.entitydescription.remdesivir: A broad-spectrum antiviral drug, commonly used to treat cases of Europan cough.
